name: The Escape
paragraphs: You climb out the window, landing on the rainy street below. You pause for a moment to catch your breath and look back up at the hospital. A bolt of lightning illuminates the top floor, revealing a figure standing in the window. It's the same figure that has been haunting you throughout your visit.

As you run away from the hospital, you feel a sense of relief wash over you. You may not have all the answers, but you've survived this nightmare. You think about your sick parent and how they sacrificed themselves to save you. You vow to honor their memory by living your life to the fullest.
